title: [BUG] SVG output/PNG render issues in 2.88 (broken SVG, PNG rendering)
body:
### Description

SVG output/PNG render issues in 2.88


DrawPicture issues with fill
DrawText broken output
Canvas.Clear SVG snd PNG inconsistency
Xamarin.Forms rendering

### Code

I have created some examples with broken output

https://github.com/EvgenyMuryshkin/SVGBugs/blob/main/SVGBugs/SVGBugsTests.cs


### Expected Behavior

SVG renders in browser and xamarin

PNG and SVG are close to each other in visual appearance (at least text all there, pictures rendered) 

styling is secondary (e.g. text Stroke is ignored, cannot create red text with black outline, only red text)

### Actual Behavior

Inconsistencies in output, some SVG attributes are ignored

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.3 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

1.x (Obsolete)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

All

### Platform / Operating System Version

Android 13, iOS 16
